mapper.insert: insert into ecs_supplier_article (article_id, cat_id, title, author, author_email, keywords, article_type, is_open, add_time, file_url, open_type, link, description, supplier_id, content ) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ecs_supplier_article set cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_email = #{authorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_type = #{articleType,jdbcType=BIT}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_type = #{openType,jdbcType=BIT}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select article_id, cat_id, title, author, author_email, keywords, article_type, is_open, add_time, file_url, open_type, link, description, supplier_id, content from ecs_supplier_article where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select article_id, cat_id, title, author, author_email, keywords, article_type, is_open, add_time, file_url, open_type, link, description, supplier_id, content from ecs_supplier_article
